forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 60F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
